name: Little Race in Space
description:
Take part in a dynamic Little Race in Space. Make a road using multicolored asteroids to make your participant run faster. And do not forget the bonuses that will help you set a new record or unlock a new achievement.

An energetic and dynamic game with a captivating gameplay.
Bright unique graphics.
12 detailed achievements that are not so easy to unlock.

Do you have what it takes to become the best player?
